title: Sea level gridded data from satellite observations for the global ocean from 1993 to present
description:
This dataset provides gridded daily and monthly mean global estimates of sea level anomaly 
based on satellite altimetry measurements. The rise in global mean sea level in recent decades has been one of 
the most important and well-known consequences of climate warming, putting a large fraction of the...

title:
Global sea level change indicators from 1950 to 2050 derived from reanalysis and high resolution 
CMIP6 climate projections
description:
This dataset provides statistical indicators of tides, storm surges and sea level that can 
be used to characterize global sea level in present-day conditions and also to assess changes under climate 
change. The indicators calculated include extreme-value indicators (e.g. return periods including con...
